text: Ghasem Rezaei (Persian: قاسم رضايى, born August 18, 1985 in Amol) is an Iranian wrestler from Mazandaran Province of Iran. He won the gold medal in the men’s 96 kg Greco-Roman at the 2012 London Olympics. Rezaei won the bronze medal in the men's 96 kg Greco-Roman at the 2016 Summer Olympics. Rezaei's first success at the international level was 2007 when he won bronze in the FILA Senior World Championships. ==Other websites== * FILA Legends: 2012 Olympian Ghasem Rezaei * profile Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:Competitors at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Sportsmen Category:Mazandaran Province
title: Ghasem Rezaei
